content: this amigurumi was inspired by the curry puff 1 a savoury pastry local to singapore malaysia and indonesia the classic curry puff consists of crispy pastry stuffed with a dry meat-and-potato curry and sometimes hard boiled egg variations include flaky layered pastry or sardine or tuna filling it is a favourite here and is best eaten piping hot from the pan or oven besides being super delicious the curry puff is also a humble child born from the marriage of culinary traditions of the various ethnic groups and cultures that settled in the malay archipelago 2 ## pattern notes ## this pattern is can be attempted by beginners however it does include the reverse shell 3 rsh worked in half_double_crochet half_double_crochet which can be challenging for new beginners the amigurumi consists of 1 part the main body is worked in the round and the sides are then joined together with the reverse shell ## finished size ## approx 10 5cm at its longest point 5cm at its widest and 3cm at its tallest finished size will vary depending on hook size yarn weight crochet gauge and how firmly the work is stuffed ## materials & tools ## yarn fingering/sports weight in golden brown or tan brown 3mm crochet hook stuffing stitch marker scissors yarn needle safety eyes and embroidery thread optional ## crochet techniques ## this pattern uses us crochet terms and consists of the following stitches and techniques magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet rsh reverse shell in half_double_crochet sts instead of double_crochet sts increase increase --- ©all rights reserved unless stated otherwise the content and images are mine please do not sell copy or distribute them without my express consent sharing of the pattern is welcomed to share the pattern please link to the pattern post 4 and include my instagram profile @yotsuba_blythes 5 with proper attribution sale of limited quantities of the finished items made from this pattern is permitted and please include my website 6 and instagram profile 7 as attribution for the pattern 1 https //en wikipedia org/wiki/curry_puff 2 https //en wikipedia org/wiki/malay_archipelago 3 https //hearthookhome com/reverse-shell-stitch-tutorial-crochet-technique-with-photos/ 4 https //yotsub4 blogspot com/2022/08/crochet-curry-puff-karipap-amigurumi html 5 https //www instagram com/yotsuba_blythes/ 6 https //yotsub4 blogspot com/2022/08/crochet-curry-puff-karipap-amigurumi html 7 https //www instagram com/yotsuba_blythes/
